name: .GVRS File Extension
summary: Learn about .GVRS files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: Applications that use the Gridfour Virtual Raster Store (GVRS) Java API can open and process GVRS images. For more detailed information, refer to the Gridfour Virtual Raster Store's official documentation.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
